channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Top Bar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Top Bar

item.title: CVE-2024-1660|2024-04-15T05:00:04.066Z -- Unknown -- Top Bar
item.description: The Top Bar WordPress plugin before 3.0.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
